video_info.title: The Emirates FA Cup 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: Macclesfield host the defending champions Crystal Palace in the third round, aiming for a historic upset at the Leasing.com Stadium. Palace, are strong favorites, but Macclesfield’s attacking style and home advantage could make this a “David vs Goliath” clash. Catch all action from the Emirates FA Cup 2025-26, LIVE on Sony LIV.

video_info.title: The Emirates FA Cup 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: Everton host Sunderland at the Hill Dickinson Stadium in an all–Premier League FA Cup third-round clash. Everton enter on a poor run of form while Sunderland have been drawing consistently but lack cutting edge, setting up a tight encounter. Catch all action from the Emirates FA Cup 2025-26, LIVE on Sony LIV.

video_info.shortDescription: Wolves begin their FA Cup 2026 campaign at Molineux against Shrewsbury. The tie promises drama, with Shrewsbury chasing a giant‑killing while Wolves aim to march on confidently. Catch all action from the Emirates FA Cup 2025-26, streaming exclusively only on Sony LIV.

video_info.title: Bundesliga 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: Union Berlin welcome Mainz to Stadion An der Alten Försterei for Bundesliga Matchday 16 on January 10, 2026. Union aim to strengthen their mid-table position with a home win, while Mainz fight to escape the relegation zone. Expect a tactical battle as Union’s solid defense faces Mainz’s desperate push for points. Tune it to catch all the action from Bundesliga 2025-26, LIVE on Sony LIV.

video_info.title: Bundesliga 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: SC Freiburg take on Hamburger SV at Europa‑Park Stadion on Bundesliga Matchday 16. Freiburg aim to cap their strong home run and push into the top‑half, while struggling Hamburg seek a breakthrough in their away form.
